greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Eigentriangle, row sums = number of ordered partitions of n into powers of 2
comment: Right border of the triangle = A023359: (1, 1, 2, 3, 6, 10, 18,...) the number of ordered partitions of n into powers of 2.
Row sums = A023359 starting with offset 1: (1, 2, 3, 6, 10, 18,...).
Sum of n-th row terms = rightmost term of next row.
formula: Let A = an infinite lower triangular matrix with the Fredholm-Rueppel sequence A036987 in every column: (1, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1,...); and B = an infinite lower triangular matrix with A023359: (1, 1, 2, 3, 6, 10, 18,...) as the main diagonal and the rest zeros.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
